subject: Snowboarding
Olympic Games
Skateboards
lead_paragraph: Skateboarding — with creative assistance from cycling’s international governing body — appears headed for the Olympics in a bid to make the 111-year-old Games more attractive to a younger audience.
snippet: Skateboarding — with creative assistance from cycling’s international governing body — appears headed for the Olympics in a bid to make the 111-year-old Games more attractive to a younger audience.
